DOC.brief_summary: This study multicenter , non-randomized , retrospective study collect long term ( 5 year post-transplant ) clinical outcome data test whether result noninvasive immune monitoring test strategy perform parent study ( CTOT-01 , NCT00308802 ) first six-month post-transplant predictive 5-year outcome . Each center complete retrospective chart review data patient survival , graft survival renal function .
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Multicenter Study Determine 5-Year Clinical Outcomes Subjects Previously Enrolled CTOT-01 Study
DOC.criteria: Participants previously enrol CTOT01 study . Participants least 5 year posttransplant ( +/ 6 month ) , later March 31 , 2014 . Withdrawal consent continue CTOT01 study .
